Blog.post: Ninja. The antithesis of all that is decent, the sneaky sneaky ninja does nothing but mince around picking fights with children in McDonalds. In a fight with a real pirate you're most likely to run for your mummy after being bitchslapped halfway around the world. Oh, and you probably can't even swim. urlLink How much of a pirate are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

wow...i stayed at a friends house last night...it was crazy man i mean her mom woke us all up at like 7 in the morning crying and screaming at my friend bobby because supposedly he put a dent on the right side of her car...which he didnt do...so she was yelling at all o us and crying uncontrollably. You couldnt even see the dent...anyways yeh it was pretty crazy...I keep telling my friend that she should move out of there because her mom is really abusive...not really physically but mentally. Her mom is always calling her names and everything and kicking her out. Shes going to go make her stay with her drug addicted biological mom and abusive biological father. Its pretty fucked up....yeh thats all i had to say i guess...maybe more later

you are the cute but psycho happy bunny. You adorable, but a little out there. It's alright, you might not have it all, but there are worse urlLink which happy bunny are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

Man, my moms being such a fucking bitch. She has this whole fucking control thing and she wont let me fucking do anything and it pisses me off so fucking bad. She just let my little 10 yr old fucking sister go away for a fucking week, but i cant go hang out with a friend and walk around because its DARK. I mean yeh i would maybe understand if it was seattle or some big city but come on now...its fucking colville population 2000. Im fucking 16 years old and i cant do shit and i keep bringing up moving out and she keeps fucking threatening me. Everyones just on this big fucking pity party and im tired of it. I just want to be fucking out of here and it pisses me off that i cant. I just want to be on my own and take care of myself but NOBODY will leave me the fuck alone and im tired of it.

Man...I have a friend named Jason...and he was homeless but not anymore...he got an apartment but he has to pay so much for it that he barely has any money left over...so i always try helping him out ya know but i always get this feeling that im bugging him and that he doesnt want me there...i went and talked to him about it and he was like no, no,no thats not it at all...just sometimes little things bother me...maybe hes still mad because i didnt have sex with him...maybe i should...i really, really like him...i dont know what i should do...im home all alone right now on a friday night typing on a stupid computer about my stupid fucking life i dont even have...just great, great, great.
